name: skdb.statement.success
description: Number of succeed statement executed by the database

name: skdb.statement.failure
description: Number of failed statement executed by the database

name: skdb.transaction.success
description: Number of succeed transaction executed by the database

name: skdb.transaction.failure
description: Number of failed transaction executed by the database

name: skdb.transaction.s
description: Duration in seconds of each transaction executed by the database

name: skdb.statement.s
description: Duration in seconds of each statement executed by the database

name: skdb.replication.table.count
description: Number of table involved durring replication

name: skdb.replication.batch.handling.count
description: Number of replication batch handled by the database

name: skdb.replication.batch.handling.s
description: Duration in seconds of each replication batch handled by the database

name: skdb.tail.count
description: Number of tail handled by the database

name: skdb.tail.s
description: Duration in seconds of tail handled by the database

name: skdb.tail.table.count
description: Number of table involved durring tail

name: skdb.replication.reboot.count
description: Number of reboot event occurs durring replication

name: skdb.replication.rebuild.count
description: Number of rebuild event occurs durring replication

name: skdb.tail.reboot.count
description: Number of reboot event occurs durring tail

name: skdb.tail.rebuild.count
description: Number of rebuild event occurs durring tail

name: skdb.replication.row.updates
description: Number of row updates found durring a table replication

name: skdb.replication.rejected.rows
description: Number of rejected rows durring a table replication

name: skdb.tail.rows
description: Number of notified row changes durring a table tail

name: skruntime.memory.persistent
description: The persistent size used by sktore runtime

name: skruntime.memory.freetable
description: The size of free table used by sktore runtime

name: skruntime.obstack.peak
description: The obstack memory size peak used by sktore runtime

name: skmonitor.memory
description: The obstack memory size used by the span itself

name: skdb.bytes.read
description: The number of bytes read durring a skdb operation

name: skdb.bytes.written
description: The number of bytes written durring a skdb operation
